input_text:
Job Title: Staff Accountant - Excellent Career Growth - West Omaha, NE

Location: Omaha, NE

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Analyst, Finance

Description:
Staff Accountant - Excellent Career Growth - West Omaha, NE
Hemphill has been engaged by a mid-sized Omaha company to hire a Staff Accountant during an exciting time. This company has established itself as an industry leader throughout the Midwest for 20+ years and expanding into a new region. This is a great opportunity to work for a stable and highly profitable company in a role that will offer you challenge, fulfillment, and career growth for years to come.
Enjoy working alongside like-minded individuals while reporting to an impressive leader who takes pride in training, developing, and helping each member of the team achieve their full potential.
This position has been created due to continued year-over-year growth and the expansion into a new region. Your responsibilities will include:
General ledger accounting, account reconciliations, and a wide variety of responsibilities associated with month-end close
Contribute individually and as part of a team as you’re involved in special projects related to financial systems, process improvement, and fixed assets
Enjoy a beautiful office located in West Omaha, excellent compensation and benefits, and continued career growth based on your performance. This mid-sized business is large enough to offer stability and complexity, but small enough to allow you to contribute to the whole accounting process and make a real impact!
To learn more about this position call Austin Hemphill at 402.334.4800 *246 or send an e-mail to ahemphill@hemphillsearch.com to learn more. Job # 9266AH
The Right Match - The First Time
Your Confidentiality is Our Priority; Hemphill will NOT Forward Your Resume Without Your Approval.
To see all Hemphill job postings go to www.hemphillsearch.com
Hemphill Voted – “Best Employment Firm” by Omaha’s Business Leaders & B2B Magazine in 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022 & 2023!
Omaha Chamber of Commerce Top 25 – “Excellence in Business Award Winner” based upon our growth and commitment to quality.
*** Never a fee to our applicants ***

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.summary: Exciting opportunity for a Staff Accountant at a growing mid-sized company in Omaha, NE.
job_responsibilities: Special projects related to financial systems, process improvement, and fixed assets
benefits: Continued career growth based on performance
output_json.company_information: Mid-sized Omaha company expanding into a new region, established as an industry leader in the Midwest for over 20 years.
